name: The green boots of Greenlight
data: It increases the users dexterity unnoticably.
It increases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It decreases the users wisdom pathetically.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'kick placement'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'flip kick'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'dodge'.
